mapper.sql: FAQQUESTIONID, FAQTITLE, FAQKEYWORDS, FAQCLASSIFYID, COLLECTION, SCAN, MODIFYTIME, MODIFYNUMBER, FAQSTATE, USERID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
,
from tbl_faqquestion
order by ${orderByClause}

select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tbl_faqquestion
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_faqquestion (FAQQUESTIONID, FAQTITLE, FAQKEYWORDS, FAQCLASSIFYID, COLLECTION, SCAN, MODIFYTIME, MODIFYNUMBER, FAQSTATE, USERID, FAQDESCRIPTION) values (#{FAQQUESTIONID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{COLLECTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{SCAN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MODIFYTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MODIFYNUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQSTATE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{FAQDESCRIPTION,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

insert into tbl_faqquestion
FAQQUESTIONID,
FAQTITLE,
FAQKEYWORDS,
FAQCLASSIFYID,
COLLECTION,
SCAN,
MODIFYTIME,
MODIFYNUMBER,
FAQSTATE,
USERID,
FAQDESCRIPTION,
#{FAQQUESTIONID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{COLLECTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{FAQSTATE,jdbcType=INTEGER},

mapper.update:
update tbl_faqquestion
FAQTITLE = #{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQKEYWORDS = #{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQCLASSIFYID = #{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COLLECTION = #{COLLECTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCAN = #{SCAN,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYTIME = #{MODIFYTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYNUMBER = #{MODIFYNUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQSTATE = #{FAQSTATE,jdbcType=INTEGER},
USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FAQDESCRIPTION = #{FAQDESCRIPTION,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where FAQQUESTIONID = #{FAQQUESTIONID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_faqquestion set FAQTITLE = #{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQKEYWORDS = #{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQCLASSIFYID = #{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLECTION = #{COLLECTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCAN = #{SCAN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYTIME = #{MODIFYTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYNUMBER = #{MODIFYNUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQSTATE = #{FAQSTATE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQDESCRIPTION = #{FAQDESCRIPTION,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where FAQQUESTIONID = #{FAQQUESTIONID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update tbl_faqquestion set FAQTITLE = #{FAQTITLE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQKEYWORDS = #{FAQKEYWORDS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQCLASSIFYID = #{FAQCLASSIFYID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COLLECTION = #{COLLECTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCAN = #{SCAN,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYTIME = #{MODIFYTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYNUMBER = #{MODIFYNUMBER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FAQSTATE = #{FAQSTATE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FAQQUESTIONID = #{FAQQUESTIONID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQCLASSIFYID=#{0}

SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion ,tbl_faqclassify WHERE TBL_FAQquestion.FAQCLASSIFYID = tbl_faqclassify.FAQCLASSIFYID AND FAQSTATE = #{1} AND tbl_faqclassify.FAQPARENTID = #{0} ORDER BY MODIFYTIME DESC LIMIT #{2},#{3}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQCLASSIFYID=#{0} AND FAQSTATE = #{1} ORDER BY SCAN DESC LIMIT #{2}")
SELECT COUNT(FAQQUESTIONID) FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQTITLE=#{0}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQSTATE = #{0} ORDER BY MODIFYTIME DESC LIMIT #{1}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQSTATE = #{0} ORDER BY MODIFYTIME DESC

SELECT FAQQUESTIONID, FAQTITLE, MODIFYTIME, FAQDESCRIPTION ,COLLECTION,SCAN,USERID,sum(CAST(SCAN AS SIGNED)+CAST(COLLECTION AS SIGNED)*10) as a FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQSTATE = #{0} GROUP BY FAQQUESTIONID ORDER BY a DESC LIMIT #{1},#{2}

SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion,TBL_FAQanswer WHERE TBL_FAQquestion.FAQQUESTIONID=TBL_FAQanswer.FAQQUESTIONID AND TBL_FAQquestion.USERID=#{0} AND FAQSTATE = #{1} ORDER BY TBL_FAQquestion.MODIFYTIME DESC LIMIT #{2},#{3}
SELECT FAQCLASSIFYID FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQQUESTIONID=#{0}
SELECT USERID FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQQUESTIONID=#{0}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQQUESTIONID=#{0}
SELECT SCAN FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQQUESTIONID=#{0}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQQUESTIONID=#{0} AND FAQSTATE = #{1}
mapper.update: update TBL_FAQquestion SET FAQSTATE = #{1} WHERE FAQQUESTIONID=#{0}
update TBL_FAQquestion SET FAQKEYWORDS=#{1} ,FAQDESCRIPTION=#{2} , MODIFYNUMBER=#{3}, FAQSTATE = #{4} WHERE TBL_FAQquestion.FAQQUESTIONID=#{0}
mapper.select: SELECT TBL_FAQquestion.FAQQUESTIONID,TBL_FAQquestion.FAQTITLE, TBL_FAQquestion.COLLECTION,TBL_FAQquestion.SCAN,TBL_FAQquestion.MODIFYTIME,TBL_FAQquestion.FAQDESCRIPTION, TBL_FAQquestion.USERID,sum(CAST(SCAN AS SIGNED)+CAST(COLLECTION AS SIGNED)*10) as a FROM TBL_FAQquestion ,TBL_FAQclassify WHERE TBL_FAQclassify.FAQPARENTID=#{0} AND TBL_FAQquestion.FAQCLASSIFYID = TBL_FAQclassify.FAQCLASSIFYID AND FAQSTATE = #{1} GROUP BY TBL_FAQquestion.FAQQUESTIONID ORDER BY a DESC LIMIT #{2},#{3}

SELECT TBL_FAQquestion.FAQQUESTIONID ,TBL_FAQquestion.FAQTITLE,TBL_FAQquestion.FAQDESCRIPTION FROM TBL_FAQquestion ,TBL_FAQclassify WHERE TBL_FAQclassify.FAQPARENTID=#{0} AND TBL_FAQclassify.FAQCLASSIFYID = TBL_FAQquestion.FAQCLASSIFYID AND FAQSTATE = 2 ORDER BY TBL_FAQquestion.COLLECTION DESC LIMIT 4

SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion,TBL_FAQanswer WHERE TBL_FAQquestion.FAQQUESTIONID=TBL_FAQanswer.FAQQUESTIONID AND TBL_FAQquestion.USERID=#{0} AND STR_TO_DATE(TBL_FAQquestion.MODIFYTIME,'%Y-%m-%d%H:%i')<STR_TO_DATE(#{3},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') ORDER BY TBL_FAQquestion.MODIFYTIME DESC LIMIT #{1},#{2}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQTITLE=#{0} AND USERID=#{1}
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion LIMIT 200
SELECT * FROM TBL_FAQquestion
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQCLASSIFYID=#{0}
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TBL_FAQquestion WHERE FAQSTATE = #{0}
